ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Medical Devices Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS, in order to remove the expiry of establishment licences on December 31 each year while maintaining a requirement for annual review of the establishment licence.
